issue.title: Front-end pagination issue
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

In front-end lists (ressources and catalog search results), when you use the pagination, you can't get back to the first page once you navigated to a later page.

This is a known issue of Joomla 3.3.6 (compatible version of easySDI 4.3.x ): https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/pull/4488


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The fix found in github should be integrated in easySDI installer as a "postflight" operation : the corrected file found in github should replace the original one from the joomla 3.3.6 version.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Has to be pushed in 4.3.0
